surface_layer.definition: A layer in a communication protocol that manages the exchange of data between two devices in terms of transactions.

deep_layer.mechanism: The transaction layer enables the sending and receiving of requests and responses, and handles the overall flow of data.
deep_layer.origin: Part of the PCIe protocol stack and other transaction-oriented architectures.

epistemic_metadata.source: PCIe® 5.0 Protocol and Electrical Compliance Testing Deep Dive
